about_the_game:
Build Your Own Game Empire!

Manage a game company, develop best-selling works, and win industry honors!

Introduction

Can you become a legend in the game industry?

Welcome to the Game Company Simulator! Here, you will play as the boss of a game company, build your company from scratch, recruit top talents, develop your own best-selling games, and challenge for the Game of the Year award!

Recruit employees: Assemble your dream team from planners to artists.

Innovative development: Explore dozens of combinations of game types and content to create unique works.

Employee cultivation: Customize career growth plans for your team to enhance productivity and creativity.

Make money in stocks: Invest flexibly in the stock market to expand the company's capital pool.

Pursue glory: Strive for million-unit sales, win industry awards, and become a myth in the game industry!

Download now and start your game legend journey!

Featured Highlights

Real game industry experience: From a startup company to a global powerhouse, fully display your management talent.

Free combination of development directions: Explore diverse game ideas to cater to different player groups.

Personalized employee cultivation: Tap into employees' potential and unleash unlimited possibilities.

Fun casual gameplay: Stock market investment, market promotion, player feedback, none can be missed!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 or AMD FX-6300 and processors with equivalent performance.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 with 2GB of memory / AMD Radeon HD 7850 with 2GB of memory or graphics cards with equivalent performance.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400F or AMD Ryzen 5 3600 and processors with performance equal to or better than them.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 with 6GB of memory / AMD Radeon RX 580 with 8GB of memory or graphics cards of a higher level.

short_description: Build your game empire! Manage a company, develop hits, win honors. Recruit, innovate, cultivate, invest. Real exp, free dev, pers. cult., fun play.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Italian
*languages with full audio support
